page.title: 10TRETOIL FARM 2
page.content:
Tretoil Tin Mine. ----------------- Mr. Kendall presented us with a booklet of notes and records dating back to 1836 when the mine was in full production. Today all that remains is an over grown shaft with trees growing from it, numerous grass covered spoil heaps and a chimney WHAT IS LEFT OF THE OLD TIN MINE? { --------------------------------- An old chimney stands in the sky. Tiny insects crawl into little cracks. Dead ivy hangs from he chimney, like a string of beads. Old bricks fall out from their places. Spiders hide from the sun, winds blow the dust. All that's left of Tretoil Tin Mine.
By Chu Ming Wong
